game.name: Closed Circuit: Recursive Idle
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Build, upgrade, and automate a circuit of ever-looping machines. Turn small node chains into powerful functions and unlock exponential idle growth that never stops.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build, upgrade, and automate a circuit of ever-looping machines. Turn small node chains into powerful functions and unlock exponential idle growth that never stops.
